column5: Thinking of a mid September trip as far as NWT.....are there any way north odges open in September?

Obviously, the weather turns colder earlierÂ in the fall way up north. What's are you looking for? species? budget? accommodation? A trip I took in mid September, the furthest north I've been in Ontario, was awesome and probably in the top 3 trips I've ever done. The lake trout were stacked like cord wood.
